mapper.select: SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , GRCODE_CD , CODE , CODE_NM , ISNULL(SYMD, '19000101') AS SYMD , ISNULL(EYMD, '29991231') AS EYMD , '' AS SEQ , Remark AS NOTE , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VCOMCommonCode_ISU

SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , Unit as LOCATION_CD , Solar as YMD , HolidayName as HOLIDAY_NM , IsHoly as FESTIVE_YN , ISNULL(IsPaid,'') as PAY_YN , LastDateTime as CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VPRHoliday_ISU

SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , WkItemSeq AS GNT_CD , WkItemName AS GNT_NM , '' AS GNT_GUBUN_CD , '' AS HOL_INCL_YN , '' AS REQUEST_TYPE_CD , '' AS WORK_YN , ISNULL(IsPaid,'') AS PAY_YN , Remark AS NOTE , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VPRWkItem_ISU

SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , DeptSeq AS ORG_CD , DeptName AS ORG_NM , BegDate AS SYMD , CASE WHEN EndDate='99991231' THEN '29991231' ELSE EndDate END AS EYMD , '' AS ORG_TYPE , Remark AS NOTE , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VDADeptInfo_ISU

SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , EmpID AS SABUN , DeptSeq AS ORG_CD , DeptName AS ORG_NM , OrdDate AS SYMD , CASE WHEN OrdEndDate = '99991231' then '29991231' ELSE OrdEndDate END AS EYMD , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VDAEmpMultiInfo_ISU

SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , '' AS ORG_TYPE , DeptSeq AS ORG_CD , DeptName AS ORG_NM , UppDeptSeq AS PRIOR_ORG_CD -- , UppDeptName , BegDate AS SYMD , CASE WHEN EndDate='99991231' THEN '29991231' ELSE EndDate END AS EYMD , '1' AS SEQ , '1' AS ORG_LEVEL , Remark AS NOTE , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VHROrgDeptInfo_ISU

SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , EmpId AS SABUN , EmpName AS EMP_NM , EmpEngName AS EMP_ENG_NM , EntDate AS SYMD , CASE WHEN RetireDate='99991231' THEN '29991231' ELSE RetireDate END AS EYMD , CASE WHEN TypeSeq='3031001' THEN 'AA' ELSE 'RA' END AS STATUS_CD , DeptSeq AS ORG_CD , '1' AS LOCATION_CD , UMJdSeq AS DUTY_CD , UMJPSeq AS POS_CD , UMPgSeq AS CLASS_CD , '' AS JOB_GROUP_CD , JobSeq AS JOB_CD , IsProd AS WORK_TYPE , WkTeamSeq AS BASE1_CD , WkTeamName AS BASE1_NM , WkDeptSeq AS BASE2_CD , WkDeptName AS BASE2_NM , '' AS PAY_TYPE_CD , CASE WHEN IsBoss = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS LEADER_YN , Remark AS NOTE , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VDAEmpInfo_ISU ORDER BY EmpId, EntDate

SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , UserId AS USER_ID , EmpId AS SABUN , EmpName AS EMP_NM , EmpEngName AS EMP_ENG_NM , EntDate AS SYMD , CASE WHEN RetireDate='99991231' THEN '29991231' ELSE RetireDate END AS EYMD , CASE WHEN TypeSeq='3031001' THEN 'AA' ELSE 'RA' END AS STATUS_CD , DeptSeq AS ORG_CD , '1' AS LOCATION_CD , UMJdSeq AS DUTY_CD , UMJPSeq AS POS_CD , UMPgSeq AS CLASS_CD , '' AS JOB_GROUP_CD , JobSeq AS JOB_CD , '' AS PAY_TYPE_CD , CASE WHEN IsBoss = 1 OR #{EmpID} = '20170054' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS LEADER_YN , Remark AS NOTE , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VDAEmpInfo_ISU WHERE EmpID = #{EmpID}
SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , DeptSeq AS ORG_CD , EmpId AS SABUN , '' AS SYMD , '' AS EYMD , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VDAEmpInfoMulti_ISU
SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , EmpId AS SABUN , ISNULL(Cellphone, '') AS HAND_PHONE , ISNULL(EMail, '') AS EMAIL , Remark AS NOTE , LastDateTime AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_VDAEmpAddInfo_ISU

SELECT CompanySeq AS ENTER_CD , EmpId AS SABUN , WkItemSeq AS GNT_CD , WkDateFr AS SYMD , WkDateTo AS EYMD , '' AS SHM , '' AS EHM , Seq AS APPL_SEQ , STATUS AS APPL_STATUS_CD , ERP_IF_DATE AS CHKDATE FROM KPXERP_TPRWkAbsEmp_ISU WHERE CONVERT(DATETIME , #{ifDate}) < ERP_IF_DATE
